originalText.text: I have worked with Orly a few times already,and I 'm keeping reaching out to her whenever translation is needed. Her work is professional ,and her attitude is personal and caring.She keeps her promises about timing ,but tries to complete it even  sooner,if it is an urgent matter.  I definitely recommend her services !

originalText.text:
Excellent and accurate translations. Prompt turn around. Professional and excellent customer support. Reasonable pricing.
I used her kind translation services, and was very happy.
Highly recommended, will use her services again

originalText.text:
Excellent Service ! I needed help with Translation for Notary services at the Israeli consulate in NY - Orly guided me through the process and help with translation, certification and apostille process.

I would highly recommend this service for any Hebrew/English translation work !

text.text:
Excellent Service ! I needed help with Translation for Notary services at the Israeli consulate in NY - Orly guided me through the process and help with translation, certification and apostille process.

I would highly recommend this service for any Hebrew/English translation work !

originalText.text:
I spent a lot of time lost and tried to figure out what to fo after I had another person do the initial translation. This wonderful woman showed me the way to get the documents completed so I could get them notarized at the israel consulate.  I made unnecessary trips to the consulate, county clerk, and Apostille on my own first.

You need to understand that the process is not simply getting the documents translated and notarized. She will make sure that not only the translation but the whole process is done correctly the first time. Do not risk wasting time and money. Use this outstanding service the first time.

Stephen W

originalText.text:
I used the Services of that Center about a year ago, some very important documents should be translated for USCG and DHS,I was looking around for a translators and heard of Center for Hebrew Translations,
Orly was very professional,quick and very understanding of what exactly should be done.
I was worried about the exact terminology and  the ability to translate it correct,but Orly were on top of it all ! As a result my documents were reviewed and processed with no problems or questions asked .

Thank you Orly, and Center for Hebrew Translations.
